name: Magnattack!
description:
This is the game made by me (Pastore) and two other friends (Flávio and Rodrigo) for the ScoreSpace Jam #18. The game feature a fusion of the well-known shooter with the power of push and pulling objects with your magnetic powers! 

You suddenly appear in a mysterious dungeon and just need to find a way out, can you do such a thing? The more you explore and fight through the rooms the more points you get. Compete with your friend to see who can get the most points per run. 

Basic Controls:

WASD - Movement, O - Pull magnetic objects towards you, P - Push magnetic objects away and I - Shoot.

Some enemies are better killed when squished...

*Artwork used is a tileset made by Scut here on itch.io, it is free to use for non commercial uses.
*Sound Effects used are free Atari sounds
*Music used are: on Menu - "Rokko Chan - Lightning Man Stage" made by ASAGEN; on Gameplay - "Battle of the Holy"from Castlevania Adventure (1989).
